googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Evan R
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: As I told Andy today our family has a new plumber! Our toilet was leaking and the tank needed to be replaced. Within two hours from calling he had it fixed. On top of that he noticed that the toilet was slow to fill after being flushed. It turns out the regulator off the street should have been set higher. He is very professional, quick to respond, and genuine in his desire to help his customers!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: PipeMasters Plumbing

plumberResearchFull.json:
## Business Information:

### Alabama Business Registration/License Details
PipeMasters Plumbing, LLC is required to be registered with the Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, as all companies performing plumbing or gas fitting work in Alabama must register with the board. The company must have a Principal Master designee responsible for the work performed[1][4].

### Physical Location and Service Areas
PipeMasters Plumbing, LLC is located at 141 14th Ave, Alexander City, AL 35010. They serve the areas of Auburn, Opelika, and Alexander City[2].

### Hours and Payment Methods
The specific hours of operation are not provided in the available sources. However, the payment methods accepted include check, traveler's checks, and cash[2].

### Years in Operation
The exact number of years PipeMasters Plumbing, LLC has been in operation is not specified in the available sources, but it is mentioned that they have over 12 years of experience[2].

## Services & Specialties:

### Types of Services Offered
PipeMasters Plumbing offers a variety of services including:
- Disposal Service
- Appliance Installation
- Water Heater Installation
- Ice Machines
- Small Drain Cleaning
- Re-Piping of Water Systems
- Redoing of Old Drains
- Under Crawl Space Water Main Repair
- Tankless Water Heater Installation
- Bathroom Remodel
- Shower Upgrade
- Outdoor Kitchen[2].

### Service Areas Covered
As mentioned earlier, they serve the areas of Auburn, Opelika, and Alexander City[2].

### Emergency Service Availability
There is no explicit mention of emergency service availability, but the positive reviews suggest prompt and timely responses to plumbing needs[3].

### Any Listed Prices or Rates
No specific prices or rates are listed in the available sources. However, customers have praised the pricing and customer service, indicating that the prices are reasonable and as quoted prior to the service[3].

## Customer Reviews & Reputation:

### Review Summaries with Specific Examples
Customers have praised PipeMasters Plumbing for their top-notch customer service, professionalism, and prompt response times. Here are some examples:
- "Their customer service is top-notch and response times to commercial plumbing needs have been fantastic!"[3]
- "They arrived promptly and fixed the problems quickly. I will definitely call them again in the future for any plumbing problems."[3]
- "The price and customer service were so excellent, I called them a week later to replace my kitchen faucet."[3]

### BBB Rating and Status
There is no information provided about the BBB rating or status in the available sources.

### Common Customer Feedback Themes
Common themes include:
- Excellent customer service
- Professional and knowledgeable staff
- Prompt and timely responses
- Reasonable pricing
- High-quality work[3].

### Response to Reviews
There is no direct information on how the company responds to reviews, but the overall positive feedback suggests a proactive and customer-oriented approach.

## Owner & Staff:

### Owner/Management Information
The specific owner or management details of PipeMasters Plumbing, LLC are not provided in the available sources.

### Staff Qualifications
The staff are described as knowledgeable, friendly, and professional. They must be certified or registered with the Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, as required by state regulations[1][4].

### Professional Certifications
PipeMasters Plumbing, LLC is mentioned as being "Licensed/Bonded Plumber & Gas Fitter with over 12 years of experience," indicating that they hold the necessary professional certifications[2].
aboutUs: PipeMasters Plumbing, LLC is a premier plumbing service provider based in Alexander City, AL, serving the areas of Auburn, Opelika, and surrounding communities. Our team of highly skilled and certified professionals specializes in a wide range of plumbing services, from routine maintenance and repairs to complex installations and remodeling projects. We take pride in our local expertise, ensuring that every job is completed with precision and attention to detail.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Unparalleled expertise and reliable service for all your plumbing needs.
sellingPoints: Licensed and bonded professionals, adhering to the highest industry standards.
Comprehensive range of services, including disposal service, water heater installation, re-piping, and bathroom remodeling.
Prompt and efficient service, with a commitment to timely responses and quality workmanship.
